<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.58</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Animations </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[Array]] of [[Strings]] where elements are the names of model animations, which should theoretically be available for use with [[animate]] command. However in practice this depends on whether animation is also made available for use in scripts via config.</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>  '''animationNames''' object</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Strings]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_names = [[animationNames]] static_AT;</code> Returns: ["MainTurret", "MainGun", "MainTurret_destructX", "MainTurret_destructY", "MainTurret_destructZ", "MainGun_destructX", "MainGun_destructY", "MainGun_destructZ", "magazine_destruct", "ammo_belt_destruct", "bolt_destruct", "charging_handle_destruct", "damagehideVez_destruct", "damagehideHlaven_destruct", "damagehideRecoil_destruct", "Turret_shake", "Turret_shake_aside", "Magazine_hide", "Ammo_belt_hide", "muzzleFlash", "AddAutonomous_unhide", "bullet001_reload_hide", "bullet002_reload_hide", "bullet003_reload_hide", "bullet004_reload_hide", "bullet005_reload_hide", "bullet006_reload_hide", "bullet007_reload_hide", "bullet008_reload_hide"]</value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 



</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[animate]], [[animationPhase]], [[animateDoor]], [[doorPhase]], [[animateSource]], [[animationSourcePhase]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
